attributes.action: Actually realise that these e-petitions are the voice of the electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recent 1.6m+ signitors of the anti road tax petition, and Tony Blair saying he won't be bowed, I'd like Blair and his cohorts to actually listen to us. This e-petition scheme is an utterly useless waste of money if the Government fails to act on what - we - the voters believe in.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
